resources:
JoozdLog Joozdlog Pilot\'s Logbook PILOT LOGBOOK Holder\'s name(s) Holder\'s licence number HOLDER\'S ADDRESS: Yes No Search Search(%1$d Flights) %1$d Flights Search Type Continue Back Clear Add Flight Edit Flight Save Email Email saved Your email address has been saved and a confirmation mail will be sent. Please check your inbox on this device, and open the provided confirmation link with Joozdlog. Email address Not an email address No email address has been found, but one is needed for automatic backup emails. Please enter it in Settings. The server did not like the entered email address for a scheduled action that requires one. Please enter it again in Settings. The server reported that your entered email address is not verified.\nPlease update your email address in Settings to get a new verification mail. Enter email %1$s (verified) %1$s (not verified) The entered email is the same as the currently saved email. Do you want to re-confirm your email address? Unknown Co-pilot Paper Logbook Name Add This Remove last Search Airports Set This Times / Functions Crew Size Reduce crew Reduce crew In seat Time for TO/LDG Undo Redo New Flight Registration Signature PF Sim Sign Save to PDF> SearchAircraft Loading Aircraft and Airports Database ➔ Settings Transfer Data Error An error %1$d has occurred. Please let Joozd know though the "Feedback" menu option.\n\nError description:\n%2$s Never Ignore for 1 day Times per year Last 12 Months Times per type Times per registration Arrivals per airport INSTRUCTOR Done! Almost done! Airport location unknown, no night time logged. An error occurred while retreiving the file you are trying to import. The file you are trying to import into Joozdlog is not supported. If you want it to be, please mail it (or preferably a few) to joozdlog@joozd.nl and I might support it in a future version. Fatal error when parsing file. This is a bug. Please send the file to joozdlog@joozd.nl so it can be fixed. Error importing file: bad_intent_error Error saving flights, could not get flights to save from file. Your email verification has been scheduled. If you are connected to the internet this should happen pretty fast, otherwise it will be the next time your device connects to the internet. Calendar Sync conflict You are editing a planned flight while calendar sync is enabled. This means some changes will be gone by next calendar sync.\nCalendar sync will be disabled until after this flight. You can re-enable it in the Setting menu. You are trying to delete a COMPLETED flight. This might be illegal. Delete anyway? You are deleting a a flight from your calendar.\nCalendar sync will be disabled until after this flight. You can re-enable it in the Setting menu. Always postpone on manual import Postpone sync %1$d names found in scan. No names found in scan. Now using IATA airport codes Now using ICAO airport codes Get planned flights from your device\'s calendar Use Calendar Sync Calendar Sync Welcome to Joozdlog 1.2 If you want to adjust any more settings (switching on automatic backup emails for example), take a look at the Settings menu after you click \"done\"! Permission needed. Joozdlog needs permission to access calendars if you want it to access your calendars. No iCalendar link found. Please save the link to your iCal calendar on your clipboard (usually long-press and select "copy URL")\nCurrently only KLM Ical links are supported. iCalendar link found. Your clipboard seems to be holding an iCalendar link. Do you wish to use this? You are loading a roster file, but calendar sync is enabled. Do you want to disable calendar sync until end of this roster? Waiting for data… Reading file Extracting flights Cleaning logbook Saving flights Imported Complete Flights Imported %1$d flights.\n%2$d flights were updated.\n%3$d imported flights did not match any in current logbook.\n%4$d flights in current logbook did not match any imported flights. Importing complete logbook Do you want to delete and replace your current logbook, or merge it? Are you sure? This will replace your entire logbook. Please make sure you really want this, and always have a backup of your current data! Replace or merge? Do you want to replace all flights by incoming flights, or merge them? Replace Merge You are importing a complete logbook. Do you want to automatically calculate missing values such as night- or multi-pilot times? About Joozdlog What\'s New Don\'t use Calendar Import You can automatically import flights into your logbook. The planned flights in Joozdlog will be synced to the calendar you pick. You can import flights from your device\'s calendar. This will look for entries like \"KL1234 AMS-LCY\" in whatever calendar you pick. Apart from these entries, none of your calendar contents are being saved or transmitted. Use Calendar Import Source: %1$s Calendar on this device Disabled iCalendar link Add names to flights if found Disabled until %1$s %1$s days Enable now Import settings Monthly Overviews, rosters and check-in sheets import supported for selected carriers (currently only KLC/KLM) only. Just share your PDF/CSV/TXT with Joozdlog. General preferences pertaining to (automatic) logging and times. Do you want to display airports in ICAO (4 letter) or as IATA (3 letter) format? PIC name required If no PIC name is set on a completed flight, flight will be marked as incomplete Augmented Crew takeoff/landing time
%1$s minutes  Remove duplicate flights from DB No duplicate flights found. %1$d duplicate flights have been removed.\nThey will also be removed from Cloud.\nHowever, to prevent them re-appearing again, remove duplicates or disable cloud syncing on any other devices you use Joozdlog on as well, or they will come back. Remind me to make a backup every
%1$s  Auto-send backup emails An email with your logbook will be emailed to you at the same interval as you get reminded to make a backup. You will still be reminded if server cannot be reached. Disable Backup now Exporting CSV file… Pick backup interval In case of an augmented crew (3 or more pilots), Joozdlog calculates the time that can be logged for copilots by subtracting this amount of time for each takeoff and landing, allocating the remaining time evenly over the pilots, then adds this time again for every takeoff/landing performed in the pilot\'s seat. Default value is 30 (10 minutes taxi, 20 minutes after takeoff/before landing) This will create a login link that you can paste in your favorite app (email, sms, notepad, anywhere). If you click that link, it will try to log you in with the username/password currently set on this device. General Preferences Backup Preferences You should periodically backup your logbook. Not Implemented This operation is not implemented yet. Nothing will happen now. No backup of logbook has been remembered. You have not backed up your logbook for %1$d days. You can give any feedback you have to Joozdlog here. I would especially be happy to read things that nag you when using the app, feature requests or compliments. Check known issues/plans here Feedback Optional contact info (phone/email/etc) Your feedback will be submitted. Thank you for helping me make this app even better! All feedback will be read, and I will do my best to answer but I might be too busy/lazy. Privacy All text entered in this screen will end up in an email to me and may be stored in my inbox until I delete it manually. It will not be saved anywehere else, and nothing will be used for any other purpose than processing/answering your feedback. You can also send an email Email address verified! The email verification data received is not valid. Do you want to request new email verification data? An email verification was scheduled but no code was saved. Please report this through the Feedback option in the menu and tell me what you did, so I can fix this bug. This is a test message! Submit Submit feedback? Issues / TODO Use Dark mode When printing logbook, make sure you make the printer fit it to printable area as the PDF does not have margins. Help Joozdlog Importer delete share Joozdlog Logo PLACEHOLDER_TEXT Send Receive QR code WORK IN PROGRESS\nThis is still work in progress, as you can see by the \"minimalistic\" design.\nIt is working, but needs an internet connection to send the data. Use fixed rest time Rest time Default Name reversed Name Value reversed Value ICAO code ICAO code descending Visits Visits descending Registration Descending Time Time descending Type Type descending Year Year descending Pick known names + Replace my name with SELF My Name
